comments:
Sun JDK 1.5.0_06. Installed a new platform binary distribution, Chose Help > Software Updates > Find and Install... menu item, select "Search for new features", chose both sites, then selected "filter features included in other features" checkbox. Got the following exception repeatedly four or five times:
